products.name: Clafoutis aux abricots
products.labels: Lait Français, Point Vert, Triman, Eco-emballages, Fabriqué dans les Hauts de France
products.packaging: Emballage en carton, Opercule en métal, Pot aluminium, pot
products.facts: ["Clafoutis aux abricots is traditionally made with fresh apricots, eggs, milk, sugar, and flour.","The dish can be made with organic ingredients to promote sustainable agriculture and reduce chemical use.","Clafoutis is naturally gluten-free when made with alternative flours such as almond or coconut flour.","Using seasonal and locally sourced apricots enhances the flavor and supports local farmers, contributing to a reduced carbon footprint."]

products.name: Chips de pommes de terre
products.labels: Sans conservateurs, Nutriscore, Nutriscore C, Triman, en:Point Vert, en:Sans colorants artificiels, en:Sans conservateurs, en:Sans huile de palme
products.facts: ["Made from 100% natural potatoes without artificial additives.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to minimize ecological footprint.","Quality checked for crispiness and flavor to ensure a premium snacking experience."]

products.name: Batchelors Marrowfat Bigga Peas
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Canned foods, Vegetables based foods, Canned plant-based foods, Canned vegetables, en:canned-legumes
products.facts: ["Made from premium quality marrowfat peas sourced from sustainable farms.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, reducing environmental impact.","High in protein and fiber, contributing to a balanced diet.","No artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring natural quality."]

products.name: Milk Chocolate Large Bar
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Confectioneries, Chocolate candies, Chocolates, Milk chocolates, Milk chocolate bar with nougat, Swiss chocolates
products.packaging: Metal, Recyclable Metals, Aluminium, Container, Aluminium-film, Card-box, Card-tube
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality cocoa beans sourced from sustainable farms.","Contains milk powder, sugar, cocoa butter, and emulsifiers for smooth texture.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial flavors and preservatives, ensuring a natural taste."]

products.name: Fairlife Chocolate
products.categories: Beverages and beverages preparations, Beverages, Dairies, Breakfasts, Milks (liquid and powder), Dairy drinks, Milks, Flavoured milks, Chocolate milks, Dietary supplements, Bodybuilding supplements, Protein shakes, Nutrition shake, Protein, Protein drinks, Shake, Shakes, Protein drink
products.labels: No gluten,Kosher,Without hormones,No lactose,Orthodox Union Kosher,Aseptically Pasteurized,Smartlabel
products.facts: ["Fairlife Chocolate is made with ultra-filtered milk, which removes lactose and increases protein content.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting sustainability and reducing waste.","Fairlife sources milk from farms that adhere to strict animal welfare standards, ensuring high-quality dairy production.","The product is free from artificial growth hormones, providing a natural and healthier option for consumers."]

products.name: HiPro Mangue
products.facts: ["HiPro Mangue is made from high-quality organic mangoes.","The product is packaged using eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","HiPro Mangue is produced with sustainable farming practices that support local ecosystems.","The quality of HiPro Mangue is ensured through rigorous testing for purity and freshness."]

products.name: Hippo Fraise
products.facts: ["Hippo Fraise is made from eco-friendly materials that are biodegradable.","It plays a role in promoting biodiversity by providing habitat for various species.","The quality of Hippo Fraise is ensured through rigorous testing for durability and safety.","It utilizes sustainable sourcing practices to minimize environmental impact."]

products.name: Pure butter
products.categories: Snacks,Sweet snacks,Biscuits and cakes,Biscuits,Shortbread biscuit with butter
products.facts: ["Pure butter is made from cream, which is churned to separate the butterfat from the buttermilk.","It is a natural product with no artificial additives or preservatives, ensuring high quality.","Butter production can have a lower carbon footprint when sourced from local, grass-fed dairy farms.","Packaging for pure butter is often recyclable, contributing to ecological sustainability."]

products.name: Nerds Candy - Rainbow
products.facts: ["Nerds Candy - Rainbow is primarily made from sugar, corn syrup, and artificial flavors.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness.","Nerds are gluten-free and do not contain any animal-derived ingredients, making them suitable for vegetarians.","The candy is produced under strict quality control standards to ensure consistent taste and texture."]

products.name: RAVIOLI VEGETARIENS issus de l'agriculture biologique.
products.labels: Bio, Bio européen, Agriculture non UE, Agriculture UE, Agriculture UE/Non UE, FR-BIO-01, Fabriqué en France, À l'huile de tournesol, AB Agriculture Biologique
products.facts: ["Made from 100% organic ingredients, ensuring no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers are used.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials that are recyclable and reduce environmental impact.","Contains a variety of fresh vegetables, providing essential nutrients and promoting a healthy diet.","Produced with sustainable farming practices that support biodiversity and soil health."]

products.ingredients_text: lait entier, crème (lait), farine de blé, amidon modifié de maïs, sel. Traces éventuelles de soja. Non ouvert,
products.facts: ["500 ml containers are often made from recyclable materials such as PET plastic or glass.","Using 500 ml bottles reduces the overall carbon footprint compared to larger containers due to less material usage.","Many 500 ml products are designed for single-use, contributing to plastic waste, but can be recycled if disposed of properly.","Quality of 500 ml beverages can vary, but reputable brands ensure high standards for safety and taste."]

products.name: Natural Light Greek Yogurt
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Desserts, Fermented milk products, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Yogurts, Greek-style yogurts
products.facts: ["Made from 100% natural ingredients without artificial preservatives or flavors.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced using eco-friendly farming practices that support sustainable agriculture.","High in protein and probiotics, contributing to a healthy diet and gut health."]
